description: Try our easy to follow Veggie Macaroni & Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mac & cheese,Seafood free,Broccoli,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Winter,Video,Sesame free,Jul 2020,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Pasta,Peanut free
name: Veggie Macaroni & Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a saucepan over low heat, then add onion and pumpkin and cook, stirring, for 10 minutes. Add broccoli and milk and simmer for 10 minutes or until milk has reduced by half.
Meanwhile, fill food flasks with boiling water and set aside.
Remove pan from heat. Add cheese and mustard powder, stirring until cheese has melted. Add macaroni and chives, stirring to combine.
Drain water from flasks and dry well. Spoon macaroni into food flasks, ready to serve.
